data.Name: CloZee
data.Bio: CloZee (Chlo√© Herry) resides in Toulouse, France. At the 2013 UK Glitch-Hop Awards, she was named Best International Newcomer. CloZee has performed on many continents: from Coachella to India, on four US Tours, and everywhere around her native France. She is a standout on the roster of her labels, Gravitas Recordings & Otodayo Records, with millions of streams worldwide Her classical guitar roots allow her an informed, melodic space that draws influence from flamenco to edIT of The Glitch Mob. Read more on Last.fm
